drivers.name: foo2hiperc
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

This is a driver developed for the Oki Data Color Laser Printers C301dn, C310dn, C3200, C3300, C3400, C5100, C5200, C56xx and C5800.

PPD files (and the Foomatic XML files to generate them) come with the driver, therefore we do not supply PPDs here on the OpenPrinting site.

notes:
The Oki C310dn is a networked color laser printer with a 2010 street price of $400 USD. This printer is supported by the foo2hiperc open software printer driver.

Consumables: Separate toner cartridges black (1500 prints, ~$32), yellow/magenta/cyan (1500 prints, ~$65 each), separate drums black (15000 prints, ~$100), yellow/magenta/cyan (1500 prints, ~$120 each)
